name: WP Advanced newsletter
author: CedCommerce

sections.description:
WP Advanced newsletter plugin allows user to subscribe newsletter to receive new updates using email subscribers Mailchimp, Constant Contact, Active campaign and Campaign Monitor.
User subscribe newsletter by enter email.

Main features

  • Easy Customization
  • Mailchimp Integration
  • Constant Contact Integration
  • Active Campaign Integration
  • Assign time in seconds to display WP Advanced newsletter popup
  • Assign time in days for expire WP Advanced newsletter popup
  • Set fields value of all Email Subscribers
  • Popup ask for Email Address to subscribe for newsletter
  • Add information of user in the list of active Email Subscribers on Newsletter Subscription
  • Contact will added in list of Email Subscribers only by Email
  • Display information of all the subscribed users in list of Email Subscribers
  • Simple and easy to understand
  • Translation Ready
  • WPML Compatible

Support

If you need support or have any question then kindly use our online chat window here or send us email at support@cedcommerce.com

Follow Us

  • Our Official Website – http://cedcommerce.com/
  • Our Facebook Page – https://www.facebook.com/CedCommerce

  • Our Twitter Account – https://twitter.com/cedcommerce
  • Our LinkedIn Account – https://www.linkedin.com/company/cedcommerce
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of WP Advanced newsletter, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “WP Advanced newsletter” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our WP Advanced newsletter plugin you can view details about it such as description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our WP Advanced newsletter plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
sections.faq:
What about if user enter incorrect email

It display unable to subscribe newsletter in front end

What about if user enter already subscribed email

It display unable to subscribe newsletter in front end
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

First version

1.0.1

  • User can change text and background color of wp advanced newsletter popup in popup color scheme in display page.

1.0.2

  • Important links like Live Demo, Documentation are added on plugin listing page for making plugin more user-friendly and for increasing plugin usability.
  • User can display animation on newsletter popup to select animation from animation setting in display section .

1.0.3

  • Fixed minor bug related to subscription.

1.0.4

  • Fixed bug related to fetch list from email subscriber.

1.0.5

  • Develop effective interface
